original_text: Her husband, however, went with her, weeping behind her all the way to Bahurim. Then Abner said to him, “Go back home!” So he went back.
korean_text: 그의 남편이 그와 함께 오되 울며 바후림까지 따라왔더니 아브넬이 그에게 돌아가라 하매 돌아가니라

sentences.original_text: Her husband, however, went with her
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 남편은 그러나 그녀와 함께 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: weeping behind her all the way to Bahurim
